tool.name: Tool

param.name: aoi_lyr
param.dialogReference: Points or areas of interest to fetch risk information from the API.
param.pythonReference: FeatureRecordSet representing points or areas of interest to fetch risk information from the API

tool.summary: A quick tool to demo extending ArcGIS via a GP tool. The tool calls an external API to get risk information about selected locations.
tool.usage: The ArcGIS user to have access to the API on the backend. This is validated against the active Portal session information. Since it's just an API call, this could also include rate limiting or billing against the user account.
